entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
